official_title: Concurrent resolution requesting the President to proclaim the fourth Saturday in March of each year as National Bake and Take Day.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to designate the fourth Saturday in March of each year as "National Bake and Take Day".

titles.title: Concurrent resolution requesting the President to proclaim the fourth Saturday in March of each year as National Bake and Take Day.
